pages.title: Overview
pages.text: Over Enchanting is typically done in the Exp Anvil, Requires some Diamonds to push an enchant above its normal Max Level, and for Upgrades, Requires Advanced Enchant on them, in order to be effective at the higher level.

pages.title: Why Bother?
pages.text: Sometimes you want to effect a larger area with an upgrade, or store more then the normal amount. Huge farms, Mining from ground level to bedrock, 'Super Speed' farms, are all possibilities.
